content:
## EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Iron Plate Production Facility
Consists of the following entities:
- **Furnaces**:
  - Stone furnace at position (x=-16.0, y=-49.0) with no ingredients to smelt, containing 56 iron plates.
  - Stone furnace at position (x=-14.0, y=-49.0) with no ingredients to smelt.
- **Inserters**:
  - Burner inserter at position (x=-13.5, y=-47.5) waiting for source items.
  - Burner inserter at position (x=-14.5, y=-45.5) waiting for source items.
  - Burner inserter at position (x=-13.5, y=-45.5) waiting for source items.
  - Burner inserter at position (x=-11.5, y=-45.5) waiting for source items.
  - Burner inserter at position (x=-14.5, y=-43.5) waiting for source items.
- **Chests**:
  - Wooden chest at position (x=-13.5, y=-46.5).
  - Wooden chest at position (x=-13.5, y=-44.5) containing 187 iron ore and 1160 iron plates.
  - Iron chest at position (x=-11.5, y=-44.5).

### Belt System
Consists of the following entities:
- **Belts**:
  - Belt from (x=-16.5, y=-48.5) to (x=-16.5, y=-46.5) directing downwards.
  - Belt from (x=-14.5, y=-45.5) to (x=-14.5, y=-47.5) directing upwards.
  - Belt from (x=-14.5, y=-45.5) to (x=-14.5, y=-43.5) directing downwards.
- **Belt Groups**:
  - BeltGroup with inputs from (x=-11.5, y=-46.5) to (x=-9.5, y=-46.5) and outputs from (x=-8.5, y=-45.5) to (x=-8.5, y=-43.5).
  - BeltGroup with inputs from (x=-12.5, y=-44.5) to (x=-12.5, y=-46.5) and outputs from (x=-12.5, y=-45.5) to (x=-11.5, y=-46.5).

## ERROR TIPS

### Errors when using inserters with no source items
- Ensure that the inserters have access to source items. Check if the source entities contain the necessary items for the inserters to pick up.

### Errors when inserting items into a full belt
- Verify that the belt has available space before attempting to insert items. If the belt is full, consider upgrading the belt or clearing the existing items to make space.

### Errors when attempting to insert items without inventory
- Before attempting to insert items, ensure that the required items are present in your inventory. Regularly check and replenish your inventory as needed.
